.list3 {

}

}

CSS
ol{
    margin: 1rem;
    padding: 0;
    list-style-type: none;
    counter-reset:number;
}
ol li{
    margin:5px 0px;
    position:relative;
    line-height:30px;
    border: 1px solid #EEB1C0;
    padding-left:40px;
}
ol li:before {
    counter-increment: number;
    content: counter(number);
    position: absolute;
    left:0;
    width:30px;
    height:30px;
    line-height:30px;
    margin-right:40px;
    text-align:center;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    background:#EEB1C0;
    border-right: 1px solid #EEB1C0;
}
